other_tests.findings: Significantly limited evaluation of hepatic parenchyma; the main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow; no ascites; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; gallbladder has been resected; small fluid collection within the gallbladder fossa containing debris, roughly 5 cm in greatest dimension.
Positive for Methicillin Resistant Staphylococcus Aureus (MRSA).
No explicit findings documented regarding ECG.
